artifacts.summary: Added helper lemmas for family index preservation, proved most of buildSeedAux_preserves_familyIndices

partial_progress.details: Session 4: Reduced sorry count from 12 to 11. Added helper lemmas for list manipulation (mem_eraseDups_append_left, addFormula_preserves_familyIndices', etc.). Proved most cases of buildSeedAux_preserves_familyIndices except imp case. The imp case requires careful handling of nested pattern matching in buildSeedAux definition.
next_steps: Complete imp case in buildSeedAux_preserves_familyIndices (needs well-founded recursion on Formula.neg inner)
Use completed lemma to prove seedConsistent

completion_data.completion_summary: Session 4 reduced sorry count from 12 to 11 by adding helper lemmas for list manipulation and proving most cases of buildSeedAux_preserves_familyIndices. The imp case requires well-founded recursion handling due to nested pattern matching.
